channel.title: I need help

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:13, topic:345740”][quote author=supra s link=topic=442122.msg3247085#msg3247085 date=1277467497]

if (command.startsWith("noclip") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME HERE")) { sendMessage("noclip enabled"); } else

u have to look at the code before adding it i can mistakes i’m only a human , here fixed
[/quote]
Wow I’m sorry but you’re an idiot. You’re making it into an if-then-else statement but not doing anything for the ‘else’ condition. Furthermore, you’re not closing the statement with a curly brace.[/quote]

because he dident posted the rest of his code …i cant change if i dont get the rest since he dident post

Read full topic

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“supra s, post:9, topic:345740”]if (command.startsWith("noclip") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME HERE")) { sendMessage("noclip enabled"); } else

u have to look at the code before adding it i can mistakes i’m only a human , here fixed[/quote]
Wow I’m sorry but you’re an idiot. You’re making it into an if-then-else statement but not doing anything for the ‘else’ condition. Furthermore, you’re not closing the statement with a curly brace.

Read full topic
